title: BRIEF-Hellman & Friedman acquires controlling interest in Securitas Direct
text:
BRIEF-Hellman & Friedman acquires controlling interest in Securitas Direct 
Oct 2 Funds associated with Hellman & Friedman: 
* Hellman & Friedman acquires controlling interest in Securitas Direct Verisure Group 
* Latham and Watkins LLP and Ernst & Young LLP served as advisors for Hellman & Friedman LLC 
* Since its founding in 1984, H&F has raised over $35 billion of committed capital (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 806 749 1136) Trending On Reuters
